data.title: Piedmont Unified School District
data.text:
6:00 PM - 7:00 PM

7:00 PM - 9:00 PM

6:00 PM - 7:00 PM

7:00 PM - 9:00 PM

In the Piedmont Schools, educators work hard to provide all students with a comprehensive, rigorous and relevant K-12 curriculum. Parent participation in classrooms, on fieldtrips, on boards and committees is very high. Residents demonstrate their commitment to education in a variety of ways, but most importantly, through a parcel tax contributing approximately $9.0 million, nearly one third of the district budget, yearly.
